text: Juee is a village in the Pauri Garhwal district of the Indian state of Uttarakhand. It lies approximately of the district headquarters town of Lansdowne, India. , the village had a total population of 172 of which 85 were male and 87 female. ==Sleep== There is only one hotel/resort for accommodation by the name Vanvasa. ==See also== * Lansdowne, India * Nainital * Bhimtal Lake * Tarkeshwar Mahadev ==References== ==External links == * Official website of Uttarakhand Government Category:Villages in Pauri Garhwal district
title: Juee
